ARABIC: وَقَالَ مُوسَىٰ يَٰفِرْعَوْنُ إِنِّى رَسُولٌ مِّن رَّبِّ ٱلْعَٰلَمِينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Musa said, 'Pharaoh! I am truly a Messenger from the Lord of all the worlds,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Moses said: "O Pharaoh, I have been sent by the Lord of all the worlds;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: And Moses said: 'O Pharaoh! I am a Messenger from the Lord of the universe.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Moses told the Pharaoh, "I am a Messengers from the Lord of the Universe.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And Moosa said, “O Firaun! Indeed I am a Noble Messenger from the Lord Of The Creation.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And Musa said: "O Fir`awn! Verily, I am a Messenger from the Lord of all that exists."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And Musa said: O Firon! surely I am an apostle from the Lord of the worlds:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Moses said, 'Pharaoh, I am a Messenger from the Lord of all Being,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Moses said: O Pharaoh! Lo! I am a messenger from the Lord of the Worlds,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Moses said, "Pharaoh, I am a messenger from the Lord of the Universe,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And Musa said: O Fir'awn! I am an apostle from the Lord of the worlds;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: And Moses said, ‘O Pharaoh, I am indeed an apostle from the Lord of all the worlds.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Moses said: "O Pharaoh! I am a messenger from the Lord of the worlds,-
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And Musa (Moses) said: "O Fir'aun (Pharaoh)! I am a Messenger from the Lord of the 'Alamin (mankind, jinns and all that exists).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Moses said: 'Pharaoh, I am a Messenger from the Lord of the Worlds,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Moses said, “O Pharaoh, I am a messenger from the Lord of the Worlds.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And Moses said, "O Pharaoh, I am a messenger from the Lord of the worlds
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [7:104] And Moses said, ‘O Pharaoh, I am a messenger from the Lord of the Worlds, to you, but he denied him. So he [Moses] said:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Moses said: Pharaoh! Lo! I am a messenger from the Lord of the Worlds) to you, but Pharaoh said: "You are lying!"
